room_title: Escape room "Conundrum Museum" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: I’ve done over 350 escape rooms throughout the world, and I have to say that this is definitely in the top 5 I’ve ever experienced. The puzzle flow and gameplay is incredibly well thought out, and the Boxaroo staff really put a lot of love and care into their craft. Beautiful work.

room_title: Escape room "Conundrum Museum" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: We had a great time in the Conundrum Museum! The puzzles were well designed, the theme was delightful, and the production was top-notch. Recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Conundrum Museum" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: The puzzles were truly unique, and I've played over 20 rooms in two different countries. This is a close second. Loved how the story is supported by the props. Can't wait for their next room to open!!

room_title: Escape room "Conundrum Museum" by Boxaroo in Boston
review: Loved the room, especially the special effects, made us jump a little and added to the atmosphere! Went as a family with our kids. Great staff. Overall an amazing adventure.
